title: Words that Fudge: Reality and why the Resurrection is so Important
description:
For as important a word as Reality is it is terribly fudgy. The dictionary definitions of it are poor. It's terribly hard to pin down. What is most real is that which colonizes. So this will get us into simulation theory and also the idea of gospels and the resurrection. 

JBP with Scruton at Oxford https://youtu.be/XvbtKAYdcZY
Vervaeke on Gnosticism https://youtu.be/ITfUCL1yTQQ
Donald Hoffman Ted Talk https://youtu.be/oYp5XuGYqqY
Virtual Reality Baptism https://youtu.be/N_88DBmdnNA
Elon Musk Recode https://youtu.be/2KK_kzrJPS8
Paul Maxwell Philosophy summary https://youtu.be/G5i2y5w8Dzc
Rupert Sheldrake something rather than nothing https://iai.tv/video/something-and-nothing?access=all
My Sunday School class on what is a gospel https://youtu.be/jetLAUx8c7Y

#meaningcrisis #johnvervaeke #resurrection

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
